TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Belguim, title = Belguim, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Belguim} }

S.FORM: Belguim hya' ga cyux maki' tay 50 50 N, 4 00 E na Oco syuw. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 30,528 sq km (maki' tay 141ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 30,278 sq km , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilung hya' ga 250 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' squliq hya' ga 11,409,077. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahun hya' ga 44.10% , lhlahuy hya' ga 22.40%, sni' naha' sa pptzyuwaw sa bzinah hya' ga 33.50%. spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' krahu' qalang hya' ga Brussels. snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' hya' ga 21 na tay mpitu' byacing na qutux kawas. mrhuw Kokka' mrhuw Kokka' ta' misuw hya' ga Philippe of Belgium, aring ryax tay 21 squ byacing tay 7 sa kawas 2313 lga, musa' spazyang balay ms'rux kya la. as. cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' CIA 外交部

Belgoim hya' ga cyox maki' tay 50 50 N, 4 00 E na Oco syow. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 30,528 sq km (maki' tay 141ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 30,278 sq km , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilong hya' ga 250 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' sqoliq hya' ga 11,409,077. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahon hya' ga 44.10% , lhlahoy hya' ga 22.40%, sni' naha' sa pptzyowaw sa bzinah hya' ga 33.50%. spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' kraho' qalang hya' ga Brossels. snyan kinramat inlongan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlongan na Kokka' hya' ga 21 na tay mpito' byacing na qotox kawas. mrhow Kokka' mrhow Kokka' ta' misow hya' ga Philippe of Belgiom, aring ryax tay 21 sqo byacing tay 7 sa kawas 2313 lga, mosa' spazyang balay ms'rox kya la. as. cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' CIA 外交部
